docs.title: 1.4.4 [7 Dec 2023]
docs.text:
• ✅ Switched to Kotlin
  • 🔁 Reworked API
  • 🧰 Code cleanup and updated dependencies

docs.title: Including in your project
docs.text:
ShoutOut is available in the MavenCentral, so getting it as simple as adding it as a dependency inside your build.gradle file

implementation "com.github.nisrulz:shoutout:$version"

where $version corresponds to latest version published in

docs.title: Debuggable
docs.text:
ShoutOut.setDebuggable(true)

setDebuggable accepts Boolean argument, with default set to false

docs.title: Tag
docs.text:
ShoutOut.setTag(" Logs to Look At 👀")

setTag accepts String argument, with default set to ShoutOut 📣

docs.title: Simple log
docs.text:
ShoutOut.log("This is Debug information here in LOGCAT")

log accepts String argument, with default set to "" i.e empty String

docs.title: Error log
docs.text:
ShoutOut.withCause(RuntimeException("Hello! I am Runtime exception"))

withCause accepts Exception argument.

docs.title: Simple log chained with Error log
docs.text:
ShoutOut
    .log(
        "This is Debug information here that is chained for adding a " +
                "message to exception stacktrace in LOGCAT"
    )
    .withCause(RuntimeException("Hello! I am Runtime exception"))
